tagline: Manages social media across all platforms, builds communities, and produces podcasts
pros: Creates platform-native content for every major social network — not one-size-fits-all reposts
Builds self-sustaining communities by nurturing power users and authentic engagement
Handles full podcast production pipeline from guest booking through distribution
Reads internet culture fluently — knows which trends to ride and which to avoid
cons: Breadth across platforms means less depth than a dedicated TikTok creator or podcast producer
Organic-only focus — doesn't cover paid social advertising or influencer deal negotiation
Platform knowledge can lag when managing 10+ platforms simultaneously; prioritization is essential

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
